name: Distant Lands: Earendel
storyline: Based on a future world where a strange and undefined disaster took place, we are chosen for unknown reasons to complete the mission of "hiding" stars, cleaning the astral view to watch further and discover new and random stars. You'll have to unveil why we shoot stars, why are we chosen and why everything looks so simple. Hide stars to obtain money, and spend it on building a village, collect Anialms, and unlock new features. Explore places like The Town or The City to read notes and watch short films someone left behind to understand your roots and the history of the world.
summary: Distant Lands: Earendel is a clicker about reality, memory and knowledge
